title: Spied From Above (6U84)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a Nazgul twice to play a [Wraith] or [Sauron] minion. That minion's twilight cost is -8 and it comes into play exhausted.
Lore:	“It leaped into all of their minds that the Black Wings had spied them and had sent armed soldiers to seize them….”
Rarity:	U
